document_data.mainbody:
Vinnia was a Night Blade who resided in the ruined Temple of Bhaal in the Undercity of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Vinnia was a light brown-haired and pale-skinned human woman armed with a crossbow. Bhaalist tattoos that decorated her neck and chest were visible from under the assassins garb.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Night Blade Vinnia was among the Cultists of Bhaal led by Cirian on a mission of venerating their evil deity through the slaughtering of innocents in the Bloomridge Park of the Lower City. It was unknown if the slaughter was commenced or if the Bhaalists were stopped and slain by the Absolute Adversaries.
